page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: One of the main trunk roads A.6 runs through the village of Hathern linking light industry in our area to easier accessability of nearby airport.It is a very busy road which is a dual_carriageway needed to accomodate large lorries and overseas containers.The rest of the roads are Broads more for the carrying of inhabitance traffic to homes.In our alloted area we have a bridge that carries the M.1 motorway that links London to Scotland.We have a canal used now mainly for pleasure boats.There is also a passenger train track in the area.There is a bus transport system with bus_stops in every area.There are more buses in the morning and evening to carry people to and from work.
